definition: an organized group of workmen, to serve as a crew member on
details:
noun
- an organized group of workmen
= synonyms: gang
- the men and women who operate a vehicle, ship, aircraft, etc.
= example: the men and women who operate a vehicle, ship, aircraft, etc.
- the team of men manning a racing shell
- an informal body of friends
= synonyms: gang
verb
- to serve as a crew member on
